messages.message:
When adding a dependency in `api-server` 's `build.bazel` files, are there any extra steps to generate files before committing?
In my PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67783/), I get the following error in CI:
```shared-utils/py-utils/udf-utils/src/py/instabase/udf_utils/runtime_config_utils.py:7: error: Cannot find implementation or library stub for module named 'instabase.build_utils.document'```
After this, I tried adding this line to `~/instabase/shared-utils/py-utils/udf-utils/src/py/instabase/udf_utils/BUILD.bazel`  but git precommit still fails due to
```The 'rev' field of repo 'https://github.com/dnephin/pre-commit-golang' appears to be a mutable reference (moving tag / branch).  Mutable references are never updated after first install and are not supported.  See https://pre-commit.com/#using-the-latest-version-for-a-repository for more details.  Hint: pre-commit autoupdate often fixes this.```
Not sure what to do from here since `pre-commit autoupdate` also didn't fix the issue to commit after.

The interesting thing is that manual tests actually worked and the endpoint was definitely hit correctly.

FYI we have an <#C070H1089H8|> channel for questions like this :slightly_smiling_face:

I do not believe api-server has been onboarded to bazel, is this some work your team recently picked up?

Hmm this might not be `api-server` then but `api-server` definitely calls this file.

The file I'm making this change in `shared-utils/py-utils/udf-utils/src/py/instabase/udf_utils/runtime_config_utils.py`  and there's a bazel build file in the same directory `~/instabase/shared-utils/py-utils/udf-utils/src/py/instabase/udf_utils/BUILD.bazel`
